articles.title: Shingrix, The Shingles Vaccine, Could Reduce Your Risk Of Dementia - Forbes
articles.description: The new recombinant shingles vaccine, ‘Shingrix,’ is associated with a reduced risk of dementia compared to an earlier shingles vaccine, according to a major new study.
